A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People are way too hard on this movie. Yes\, it had stupid and pointless elements\, and yes\, it wasn't perfect\, and yes\, it sidelined important characters for no good reason . . . what was my point again? Oh\, the movie isn't that bad\, it's the middle movie in a trilogy\, it's going to get reconnected\, and some things are going to be changed. Rey's parents don't matter - yeah BS\, they'll matter in the next movie. Snoke died for no reason - no\, they replaced him with Kylo as the main villain. The diversity angle was stupid and pointless - not because they shouldn't be there\, but because they were wasted. I really wanted to see character development for Fin\, and he just didn't matter in this movie.
